alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Frontier and southern Hayes Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Hayes Center to near Palisade. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayes Center, Hamlet, Quick, Bluegill Haven Campground, Willow View Campground, Freedom and Red Willow Reservoir State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
